articles.title: About Me
articles.description: Who I am and what this blog is about.

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
Python
Analyzing US Economic Data and Building a Dashboard
In this project, I used Python to analyze US Economic Data including GDP and unemployment.
R
Analyzing Forest Fire Data
Using R and the Tidyverse, I analyzed forest fire data. The goal of this project was learning how to use data visualizations for exploratory analysis.
SQL
Analyzing CIA Factbook Data
Using SQL, I analyzed factbook data. The goals of this project were to learn how to work with data using SQL in Jupyter notebooks and use SQL to generate summary statistics.
